info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:52PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Hidalgo County through 315 PM MDT... At 251 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Steins, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could produce blowing dust with low visibilities and the winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rodeo, Cotton City, Steins, Animas, Road Forks, Lordsburg Playa and Granite Gap. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
